articles.title: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Withdraws $500 Million in mRNA Vaccine Funding
articles.description: U.S. Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announced the withdrawal of $500 million in funding for mRNA vaccines targeting diseases such as the flu and COVID-19, citing concerns that 'mRNA technology poses more risks than benefits for these respiratory viruses.'

articles.title: Trump Threatens to Federalize D.C. After Former DOGE Staffer Assaulted
articles.description: President Trump is considering deploying the National Guard to Washington, D.C., and taking control of the city's police department following the assault of a former DOGE staffer in an attempted carjacking. He stated on social media that he had 'no choice but to take federal control of the city.'

articles.title: France, Spain, and Portugal Battle Wildfires Amid Heat Wave
articles.description: Southern France is experiencing its largest wildfire in nearly 80 years, resulting in at least one death and three missing persons. Concurrently, wildfires in Spain and Portugal have prompted evacuations as the region endures a prolonged heat wave with temperatures reaching up to 110 degrees Fahrenheit.
